headline: Lennar Announces Extension of Expiration Date of Exchange Offer
summary: Lennar Corporation (NYSE: LEN and LEN.B) ("Lennar") announced today that as a result of the ongoing U.S. federal government shutdown, it is extending the expiration date for its previously announced offer to exchange the approximately 20% it owns of the total outstanding shares of Millrose Properties, Inc. (NYSE: MRP) ("Millrose") for outstanding shares of Lennar Class A common stock (the "Exchange Offer"). The Exchange Offer, which had been scheduled to expire at 12:00 midnight, New York City t

headline: Vertiv and Lennar Corporation have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: Zacks names Vertiv Holdings as its Bull of the Day for its dominant AI infrastructure, while homebuilder Lennar earns the Bear of the Day tag amid slowing demand and falling margins.

headline: U.S. Economy: The Pain In Housing Is Just Beginning
summary: The housing market still has plenty of pain left to feel. Discover why home prices may fall soon despite stock market highs.

headline: Bear of the Day: Lennar Corporation (LEN)
summary: The recent negative earnings revisions, which landed the U.S. homebuilding giant a Zacks Rank #5 (Strong Sell), extend a prolonged downward trend for Lennar.
